general.description:
I'm Lahiru Madhusankha. Currently I've completed BEng software engineering degree with

projects.description:
Angular 2 Application
Jan 2018

Project descriptionThis is an application which was done using angular 2. Used routing, grids, css, and etc.

See project Angular 2 ApplicationSee project
Project nameSpring Boot Rest Application
Jan 2018

Project descriptionThis is simple application which was done using spring boot for implementing Rest api and database connection with MySQL. Database I have used is MySQLMaster Data Project - MAS Holdings
Jan 2016 – Aug 2016

Project descriptionMaster data application is a .net project which act as an interface between SAP and User. Due to lack of functionalities and facilities provided by SAP, Master data project was created.
The main task of the application was creating and maintaining the data in SAP. As an example SAP contained data regarding products which MAS create, material they used, customers and vendors of the company and etc. Master data project contained sub projects like customer master and vendor master. Vendor master was done by me. There were several roles of users in the application like requester, 1st approver, 2nd approver and super user. When requester create a data set it should be approved by 1st approver and 2nd approver before sending them to SAP. Until it is send to SAP data were saved in SQL server. Each user is informed by email with relevant link.
This is a .net web application which used layered architecture (Client layer, WCF Service layer, Business logic layer and data access layer). Front-end development was done with angularjs because it provide much more functionalities for creating interface, validation and etc. client application layer contained with html files, JavaScript files, angular service and c# controllers. Business logic layer was accessed through WCF service layer. Entity framework and stored procedure were used in Data access layer to work with SQL server. Repository pattern with Generic classes was used for executing functions with database.

schools.description: I've completed software engineering degree at informatic institute of technology(IIT) which offers degree from university of Westminster,UK.I had been learning in IIT for four years.I'm aware of handling both java and C# languages and also php,html,css. When participating to the imagine cup compitition of microsoft(smart jacket,team BlackWolf) i did cording to arduino board and other circuit works. Also as my as my final year project i did landslide predicting application which is able to give prediction about future landslides.

I have been learning in Nalanda college for 8 years after facing my grade 5 scholarship exam. I did my G.C.E.  O/L and G.C.E A/L at Nalanda College. I got 8 A and 1 B for G.C.E.  O/L and 1 B and 2 S for my G.C.E A/L in first attempt and 2 C and 1 S for second attempt.

allSkills: C#, CSS, Java, Android Development, PHP, Microsoft Office, NetBeans, Windows, Photoshop, Arduino, Eclipse, .NET Core, SAP, ABAP, SQL, Spring Boot, Entity Framework, Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), AngularJS, angular 2, Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), Customer Service, Stored Procedures, Windows Workflow Foundation (WF), Workflow Management
